DOC.detailed_description: Paracetamol Ibuprofen relieve pain different mechanism . Paracetamol term simple analgesic antipyretic . Despite endure assertion act inhibition cyclooxygenase ( COX ) -mediated production prostaglandin , unlike non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) . Ibuprofen commonly use frequently prescribe NSAID . It non-selective inhibitor cyclo-oxygenase-1 ( COX-1 ) Cyclooxygenase-2 ( COX-2 ) .4 Although anti inflammatory property may weaker NSAIDs , prominent analgesic antipyretic role . Patients receive paracetamol Ibuprofen medication scheme accord random allocation . - After enrollment record baseline information , next numbered study drug pack obtain , administer infusion 5 minute . - Randomization achieve use computer software generate random number . - One researcher blind patient allocation observe whole procedure record Low Back Pain score . - Patients group receive two type medication similar manner ( example , 150 ml normal saline give slow intravenous infusion 5 minute ) , thus ensure double blinding . - Low Back Pain score record 0 , 15 , 30 min VAS 1 10 - Rescue medication give within 30 minute study drug administration patient say yes question `` Do need additional analgesic requirement '' . - All medication require study also record .
